name: Shoot Prisoner:FPS Shooting Sn
description:
Shoot Prisoner:FPS Shooting Sniper is an intense FPS action packed thriller. The chaos at the central jail and prison has breakout, the prisoners are fighting and the riot has breakout in this hard time city jail. Get ready to join the SWAT sniper shoot hunt squad, keep spying from the jail tower and eliminating the criminals and culprits try to breakout from the city prison.
FEATURES

• Play as prison sniper survival hero of the City
• Eliminate Prisoners & City Gangsters
• Thrill of Playing in prison sniper games.
• Highly Additive & Immersive Gameplay
• Aim, Shoot and Take out Head-shots with FPS shooter.
